koohiiStory1: A woman might be REPELLED by a porn star´s GIGANTIC penis, so he kindly offers to use his FINGERS instead.
koohiiStory2: Having gigantic fingers is useful to repel insects. You can swat them away a lot easier!
myStory: chống lại, từ chối. chữ Cự (chống cự).
words:
拒絶(きょぜつ): refusal, rejection
拒否(きょひ): denial, veto, rejection, refusal
